info.name: Notion_Clone_API
info.description:
Welcome to the API documentation for Notion Clone! This collection provides detailed information about the endpoints and functionalities available for interacting with the Notion Clone application through its API.

## Overview

Notion Clone is an application designed to replicate the core features of the popular productivity tool, Notion. With the Notion Clone API, developers can programmatically create, update, and retrieve various resources such as pages, workspaces, and blocks. This allows seamless integration of Notion Clone with other applications, enabling users to automate tasks, extract data, and build custom workflows.

## API Base URL

The base URL for accessing the Notion Clone API is:

```
https://api.notionclone.com/v1

```

item.description: The Users folder contains API endpoints related to user management and information retrieval. Use these endpoints to retrieve user details, update profiles, manage workspaces, and handle favorites.

item.description: The Authentication folder contains API endpoints related to user authentication, registration, and access token management. Use these endpoints to handle user authentication and session management in the Notion Clone application.
